definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This tests for the block that the plow is right clicked on.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.FARMLAND</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_swing_mainhand"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This gives the tool the swinging animation.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This only damages the item in the players hand if the player is not in creative mode.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_set_damage"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This runs the script on the server side.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">item.hoe.till</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This plays the hoe tilled sound effect.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">FALSE</field><field name="nbt">FALSE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This replaces the block to the "Plowed Dirt" block</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PlowedDirt</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_logic_set"><comment pinned="false" h="87.368408203125" w="289.47369384765625">This adds to the block a NBT variable for later use for testing if the block needs Quick Lime
The block when first plowed will always need quick like so this value should be set to false.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">countrycraftBlockHasQuickLime</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_logic_set"><comment pinned="false" h="69.47369384765625" w="252.631591796875">When the block is added we will need the block to have fertilizer so we will need to set this value to false for later use.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">countrycraftBlockHasFertilizer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set"><comment pinned="false" h="84.2105712890625" w="248.4210205078125">This number value will hold how many harvests the block has had,when the number reaches 3 the block will need more Quick Lime.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">countrycraftBlockHarvestNumber</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Every three harvest will require Quick Lime to be added to the soil.</comment></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
